short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension that helps you get straight to the recipe.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is a quick way to make use of an overwhelming culinary site on which You tried to find the recipe, but ended up reading 10 paragraphs about the dish history.
